title: Classic Stephen King Book Box Set Gets 50% Discount At Amazon
Final Fantasy 7, 8, And 9 Are Finally Getting Physical Switch Releases In America

description:
Ever since Ghostface appeared in Call of Duty years ago, I've been impatiently waiting for my favorite horror icon to arrive in my favorite multiplayer game. I knew it was just a matter of time, and thankfully that time is now. Fortnitemares 2025 adds Ghostface among so many other crossovers, like Scooby-Doo, Terrifier's Art the Clown, indie horror hits REPO and Poppy Playtime, and more, to Fortnite. But not all of these collabs got the same treatment, and even cooler than the upcoming Ghostface skin is the new Scream-inspired weapon.

In Fortnite's latest Halloween event, you can find the new Last Call weapon inspired by Scream's legendary slasher. The weapon is more like a set of features; it's a knife with attached movement abilities, voice lines, and, when equipped, a full Ghostface costume. Unlike the Scooby Snacks or Doja Cat's Thorn Ripper, whic
title: Fortnite's Ghostface Crossover Is Way Cooler Than You'd Expect

description: So, a new Battlefield 6 game is now in the wild and you’re thinking about dipping your toes into Electronic Arts’ historied FPS franchise.
title: Battlefield 6 Essential Starter Guide

description:
Up until now, every character confirmed to appear in Invincible Vs--the 3v3 tag fighter starring characters from Skybound's Invincible series--has been a souped-up superhero. Today, at New York Comic Con, Skybound and developer Quarter Up changed that, as Global Defense Agency head Cecil Stedman has officially been added to the playable roster.

Designing a human character to fight against superhuman opponents on the level of Omni-Man and Invincible requires a change of approach. GameSpot sat down with Robert Kirkman, creator of Invincible, and multiple members of the dev team at Quarter Up to speak about the process of bringing Cecil and his unique abilities to the game.

"Only" human

As a "normal" human among superheroes, Cecil relies less on superior strength and speed, and more on the vast resources of his government agency to provide extra firepower. This idea was key to Cecil's appearance in Invincible Vs, as it's thos
title: Invincible Vs Roster Adds Cecil Stedman, A "Regular Guy With Government Funds"

description:
A 17-year veteran on the Halo development team has left the company, posting an ominous-sounding message on the way out.

Glenn Israel said on LinkedIn that he is "no longer contributing to the Halo universe" after working on the sci-fi series since 2008. Israel got his start on the Halo franchise at Bungie before joining 343 Industries--now known as Halo Studios--as art director.

Israel said in his post that there is "little more I can say for the moment" about the nature of his exit from the Halo development team. He added, "I intend to share this particular story in its entirety when it is absolutely safe to do so next year."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: 17-Year Halo Veteran Leaves Xbox And Shares An Ominous Message On The Way Out

description:
If you're wondering how long it takes to beat the Battlefield 6 campaign, we have you covered with this mission guide. The game comes packed with a full campaign, collectibles to hunt down, and plenty of achievements to earn. Below, we'll break down the mission list and all of the side objectives you might want to tackle during your playthrough of Battlefield 6's story.

How long is Battlefield 6 - Campaign length and missions

Battlefield 6 has a total of nine campaign missions. On average, it should take you around 4-5 hours to complete the campaign on the normal difficulty level. Of course, you can take your time to explore the map, hunt down collectibles, and attempt the game's specific achievement/trophy requirements. A harder difficulty could lead to slower mission progression, naturally.

Battlefield 6 campaign mission list

  • Always Faithf
title: Battlefield 6 Full Campaign Mission List And Hours It Takes To Beat

description:
Fortnite's latest edition of Fortnitemares includes horror icons like Jason, Ghostface, the Scooby Gang, and Doja Cat. The only nonfictional character on that list has already made some waves across social media--or at least the Fortnite X account that was supposedly being run by her.

Doja Cat was scheduled to take over the Fortnite X account on Wednesday before the release of the Fortnitemares announcement, but she says it wasn’t actually her after the account posted a message about "rose toys" that some assume was referencing sex toys. Doja Cat responded directly from her actual account.

"I told them not to, man. That’s not even me," she wrote on X. "I said this yesterday and then said 'don’t post that' :/."
title: Fortnite's Doja Cat Crossover Started With A Very Awkward Moment

description:
Earlier this year, developer Heart Machine released Hyper Light Breaker in early access after a nearly two-year delay. However, the game's development is winding down due to layoffs at Heart Machine.

As reported by Game Developer, a spokesperson for Heart Machine said the layoffs "will include a conclusion on the project, [and] it reflects broader forces beyond our control, including shifts in funding, corporate consolidation and the uncertain environment many small studios like us are navigating today."

A follow-up statement from Heart Machine indicated that it isn't completely abandoning Hyper Light Breaker, and ther
title: Hyper Light Breaker Winding Down Development Amid Studio Layoffs

description:
Warner Bros. and Legendary have announced A Minecraft Movie 2. The sequel is set to hit theaters on July 23, 2027. That's a couple months after the live-action The Legend of Zelda movie comes out.

Assuming the schedules hold, A Minecraft Movie 2 will come to theaters on the same day that The Simpsons Movie 2 arrives in July 2027.

The announcement of the sequel is no surprise at all. The original film, released in April 2025, made more than $950 million worldwide. It's the No. 2 highest-grossing video game movie of all time, and the No. 69 highest-grossing movie of all time for all fil
title: A Minecraft Movie 2 Announced, Coming July 2027 Just After Zelda Movie
Hot Wheels Bowser's Castle Raceway With 35-Kart Garage Is Only $50 At Amazon

description:
The new patch notes are in for Borderlands 4, and like several other updates, this new round of tweaks to the game is focused on empowering players--specifically, their arsenal of weapons. Gearbox says that it's focusing on smaller gear adjustments, starting with several Legendary-class weapons. These hard-to-find weapons haven't felt as good to use in combat despite having unique perks, so their overall power is getting dialed up substantially.

One prime example here is the Hellwalker, a Jacobs fire-and-forget shotgun that was introduced in Borderlands 3 and is almost a carbon copy of the Super-Shotgun used by the Doom Slayer in Id's Doom games. This will now do 30% extra base damage, so if you have a Jakobs mod equipped and the right skills activated, it should shred through rank-and-file enemies with eas
title: Borderlands 4 Patch Notes Reveal Big Buffs For Several Legendary-Class Guns

description:
The most wonderful time of the Fortnite year is upon us--Fortnitemares has begun! This year's event is as big as it's ever been, with nearly a dozen new collaborations, a significant overhaul to the Battle Royale map, an entirely new Reload island, and even a completely free skin that you can earn without too much effort.

Let's dive in and take a look at everything that's new in Fortnite now that Fortnitemares has started.


When does Fortnitemares end?


The Fortnitemares party runs until November 1, at which point we expect the dedicated S
title: Fortnitemares 2025: All Skins, Crossovers, Weapons, And New Map
Lexar 512GB And 1TB MicroSD Express For Switch 2 Get Massive Discounts

description:
Longtime Xbox devotees have recently seen several former exclusive games go to PlayStation 5, while Microsoft has raised prices on Game Pass and Xbox consoles in the US. Now, one of Xbox's original team members, Laura Fryer, is calling out her former employer and describing the price increases as a "betrayal" of the trust that gamers placed in them.

"With this latest increase to Game Pass, Xbox threw away one of their last advantages," said Fryer in her latest YouTube video. "They were the best deal in gaming... With these price hikes, it feels like a betrayal, like greed over gaming... I recognize that this Xbox console generation isn't over yet, it's almost certainly going to be rememb
title: Xbox Co-Founder Calls Game Pass Price Hike A "Betrayal'

description:
As announced previously, Battlefield 6 is getting a major day-one patch that includes 200+ changes, fixes, and improvements, and now Battlefield Studios has published the full patch notes. You can also read GameSpot's Battlefield 6 review to see our thoughts about the game so far. The Battlefield 6 global release times have also been announced.

Patch 1.0.1.0 includes a "wide range of updates and improvements" based in part on feedback from the Battlefield 6 open beta weekends earlier this year and the Batt
title: Battlefield 6 Day-One Patch Notes Include These 200 Changes And Fixes

description: Battlefield 6 plays it safe but marks a return to form for the long-running series, delivering chaotic, large-scale multiplayer that's as familiar as it is uproariously fun. This is currently a review-in-progress because the reviewer needs to spend some time on fully populated servers before sharing full impressions of the game's various modes and maps.
title: Battlefield 6 - Good Company (Review-In-Progress)

description:
At its best, Battlefield 6 is everything you could ask for from a Battlefield game. Intense, close-quarters firefights transition into long-range skirmishes as control points change hands and the action moves from the tight confines of half-destroyed buildings to open stretches of land. As fighter jets and helicopters swoop overhead, a medic pulls out a defibrillator and rushes into a hail of bullets to revive a squadmate who was just blown up trying to destroy a tank with a handful of C4.

Elsewhere, a sniper taking residence in a high-rise building is snuffed out by a well-placed RPG, blowing a hole in their nest until the entire building eventually collapses in on itself, while just a few yards away, the burnt husk of a helicopter drops out of the sky as its previous occupants parachute to the ground amidst a salvo of gunfire. Battlefield 6 is a return to form for a multiplayer shooter that thrives on emergent chaos.
title: Battlefield 6 Review - Good Company

description: Halo Studios has promised a deep dive into the future of Halo on Oct 24. Lucy and Kurt are tasked with saving or destroying Halo forever. Which will come to pass? Probably Kurt's remake prediction since that just leaked after filming this.
title: Will Halo be Saved or Destroyed?

description:
As Epic promised when the company revealed Gorillaz as the most recent Fortnite Festival headlining artist back in August, Fortnite's new music pass doesn't have any skins based on famous people. Instead, we've got a couple generic and rather unremarkable Fortnite skins, pictured above--the one on the left, Sedona, unlocks immediately when you purchase the music pass, and the one on the left, Jana Pastel, unlocks at the end of the pass.

Fortunately, there's a tradeoff involved in that. Since the pass doesn't include a new Icon skin, it instead comes with six licensed jam tracks, up from the usual four. There aren't any extra Epic-original tracks, though. There are still only four of those this time, though they're still free, as usual--you can unlock them without buying the pass. Here's the list of licensed tracks in the Season 11 music pass:

  • Gorgeo
title: Fortnite Festival Mixtape Music Pass: All Jam Tracks, Skins, And Other Rewards

description:
One of the most popular elements of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's multiplayer beta has been its "open" playlists, which only include "minimal skill consideration," or, in essence, little or no SBMM. Now, Activision has confirmed that this will be the default for Black Ops 7 multiplayer at launch, and it's something that some part of the audience has been requesting for years.

"At launch, open matchmaking with minimal skill consideration will be the default for Black Ops 7 multiplayer. Simply put, imagine the matchmaking experience of Open Moshpit from the beta, but as the standard in Black Ops 7 on day one," Activision said in a blog post.

"Our team feels strongly about providing players with a more varied experience, and the beta proved to b
title: Black Ops 7 Multiplayer Will Be Non-SBMM By Default At Launch

description:
Call of Duty Season 6 goes live in Black Ops 6 and Warzone on October 9, and the latest patch notes reveal major changes for the season. This includes new seasons of Ranked Play, weapon improvements across multiplayer and Warzone, as well as several bug fixes for maps in Zombies mode.

Call of Duty has entered its spooky season. Season 6 is themed around the game's annual The Haunting event for Halloween, bringing holiday-theme
title: CoD Season 6 Patch Notes Detail Weapon Buffs And Bug Fixes For BO6 And Warzone
Final Fantasy 7 Remake & Rebirth Twin Pack Releases December 4

description:
Happy Fortnitemares 2025! Fortnite's best annual event is back, and it's bigger than ever. This Halloween season, Fortnite is introducing nine new collaborations with horror movies, spooky games, and even Doja Cat, who takes over as the Big Bad of the event. While many of the new skins and rewards will be available in the shop, you can earn a lot of free Fortnitemares rewards, including a creepy new skin, by completing your Fortnitemares quests. In this guide, we'll walk you through how to complete all of your Fortnitemares challenges and earn every last Halloween-themed item that the game is giving out for free.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Fortnitemares quests 2025
    • Complete Fred, Velma, Daphne, and Shaggy's found
title: Fortnitemares Quests 2025: How To Get A Free Fortnite Skin And All Rewards

description:
Say hello to Anime Village Online, a new game set for 2027 that has a PSN listing. Coming from developer GamePoc, the title has some striking similarities to Nintendo's Animal Crossing franchise. The notable resemblance includes the character design (especially the eyes), the game's name, as well as the fact that it's built around decorating, fishing, and growing crops.

GamePoc hasn't released a game before, but the developer also has a listing for Rooted: Survival that features imagery that looks a great deal like The Last of Us. GameSpot reached out to GamePoc CEO Wisnu Sudirman about these projects; Sudirman responded that both games are real.
title: Animal Crossing Imitator Pops Up On PSN, Alongside A Last Of Us Lookalike

description:
Controversial billionaire Elon Musk made a bold claim this week that his xAI game studio will deliver a "great" AI-generated game by the end of 2026. The comment was soon met with a wave of criticism from industry professionals, and publishing director Michael "Cromwelp" Douse from Baldur's Gate 3 developer Larian Studios didn't mince his words in response to Musk's plans.

"Genuinely, what this industry needs is not more mathematically produced, psychologically trained gameplay loops, [but] rather more expressions of worlds that folks are engaged with, or want to engage with," Douse posted online. "AI has its place as a tool, but we have all the tools in the world, and they aren't compensating for the incredible lack of cogent direction. AI isn't going to solve the big problem of the industry, which is leadership and vision."
title: Elon Musk's AI Game Plans Called Out By Larian Studios Lead

description:
Activision has released new statistics that speak to cheating in the Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 multiplayer beta, with the company claiming that nearly 99% of matches are cheater-free.

Activision's anti-cheat team, Ricochet, said when the beta began back on October 2, about 97.5% of matches were cheater-free. By the fifth day of the beta, about 98.8% of matches had no cheaters.

The publisher went on to say that the anti-cheat tools in Black Ops 7's beta "adapted and improved" over time, helping to ensure "more players experience the clean matches they expect."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Almost 99% Of Black Ops 7 Beta Matches Are Cheater-Free, Activision Claims

description:
I have a pet theory about roguelikes: The play-die-repeat loop has been fused with almost every genre imaginable, but the ones that pair best are genres that have always revolved around repeated play. Balatro's gonzo approach to poker or Hades' riff on the isometric action game took the core of games that had been built from the start to accommodate repeated runs and then added the incentives of stacking, iterative power-ups and progression on top of them.

Absolum is a game that is fundamentally built around the classic beat-'em-up. That genre is among the earliest, virtually a cave painting in video game history--the classic quarter-muncher. Beat-'em-ups were built for repeated fun because they needed to keep attracting you back to plunk in another coin, but they were also built to be remarkably hard. These qualities, which developers have sometimes struggled to modernize, make the roguelike element fit like a glove. As a result, Absolum is an absolute bl
title: Absolum Review - A Sleeper Hit

description: Absolum Infuses a classic beat-'em-up structure with a modern roguelike loop which is a match made in heaven.
title: Absolum Review: A Sleeper Hit

description:
Marvel Comics has one of the best rosters of superheroes and supervillains, and you're able to smash them against each other in Marvel Rivals now that the game is available to play on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. A free-to-play team-based competitive shooter that has kicked off the Dracula-themed Season One update, Marvel Rivals is developed by NetEase and features playable characters from superteams like the Avengers, X-Men, and Guardians of the Galaxy.

So far, dozens of heroes and villains are in the game, giving players a diverse group of portal-manipulating wizards, not-so-jolly green giants with astonishing anger management issues, and a fictional K-pop sensat
title: Marvel Rivals Characters: Every Superhero And Supervillain Revealed So Far

description:
Free Switch 2 Game Update Changes


Nintendo has detailed what improvements players should expect with free Switch 2 updates for original Switch games, such as Pokemon Scarlet/Violet, The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, and Super Mario Odyssey. The benefits range from frame-rate improvements to HDR support.

Switch 2 is backwards compatible with almost all o
title: Every Free Switch 2 Update For Original Switch Games, Including Pokemon Scarlet/Violet

description:
GameShare Goodness


One of the overlooked new features for Switch 2 is GameShare, which offers the ability to let other people play select titles on their systems with only one copy of the game. This can be co-op with a buddy or even competitive multiplayer. So far, Nintendo has detailed six games that support this functionality, such as Super Mario Odyssey and Super Mario Party Jamboree + Jamboree TV - Switch 2 Edition.

Here's a quick breakdown of how GameShare works: Locally, Switch 2 owners can share compatible titles with other Switch 2 and original Switch players. But online through
title: Every Game That Supports Switch 2's GameShare
